```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
sarima <- read_csv("ST/data/sarima_previsao.csv")

rn_previsao_2012 <- read_delim("ST/data/rn_previsao_2012.csv",
";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)

hw <- read_csv2("ST/data/hw_previsao_2012.csv")

prev_2012 <- read_delim("ST/data/2012.csv", ";",escape_double = FALSE, col_names = FALSE,locale = locale(decimal_mark = ","),trim_ws = TRUE)
```


```{r}
previsoes <- as.data.frame(cbind(prev_2012$X1, sarima$Point.Forecast, rn_previsao_2012$`Vendas Previstas`, hw$fit))

names(previsoes) <- c("real", "sarima", "rn", "hw")

row.names(previsoes) <- c("Jan", "Fev", "Mar", "Abr", 
                      "Mai", "Jun", "Jul", "Ago",
                      "Set", "Out", "Nov", "Dec")
previsoes
```

comparacoes

```{r}
previsoes <- mutate(previsoes, dif_sar = sarima-real,
                               dif_rn  = rn- real,
                               dif_hw  = hw-real)
previsoes
```
